altTitles.ja: ラブかライクか分からない！
チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 陰のハンターはSSS級悪魔と契約する

altTitles.ja-ro: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.en: The Shadow Hunter Makes a Deal With an SSS Class Demon

description.en: One day, the world was invaded by "demons" that appeared from a gate. Humans, who made contracts with the "Divine Spirits," a race destroyed by the demons, gained supernatural powers and began fighting against the demons. Makoto Asuka, who had become a Hunter, had been a shadowed figure for two years as no Divine Spirit had appeared for him. However, in front of him appeared a beautiful girl who sought a contract. But it turns out she's not a Divine Spirit, but a demon...!?

altTitles.ja: お隣のニートさん

description.en: I have a neighbor next door who is a NEET, but she's not just any NEET.
description.es-la: Tengo una vecina al lado que es una NEET, pero no es una NEET cualquiera.
description.pt-br: Eu tenho uma vizinha que é uma NEET, mas ela não é uma NEET qualquer.

altTitles.ja: ダヴルの王冠

description.en: The setting is a church in Japan. The main character is Rui, the strongest former hitman. It's a violence and comedy about a group of hitmen protected by the church!

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

title.en: Become the Strongest Hero Through the Cheat System

altTitles.ja: チートシステムで最強勇者に成り上がる

altTitles.ja-ro: Cheat System de Saikyou Yuusha ni Nariagaru

description.en:
In a world overrun by monsters known as "Darklings," a young man named Tsuyoshi, who lost his parents, was making a living by scavenging items to support himself and his younger sister. However, one day, upon finding a strange item called the "Boundless Ring," Tsuyoshi was suddenly transported to another world, where he found himself on the brink of being executed by beastmen!

But just as his soul cried out, "I don't want to die" and "I want to be a hero," the "Boundless Ring" began to glow, granting him an incredibly powerful body and he got his hands on the beastmen's sacred treasure, the "Divine Hammer." Witnessing this turn of events, the King of the beastmen declared a challenge. If Tsuyoshi could train himself and become the hope of the beastmen within a year, he would be spared from execution. He already has no other way left than to move forward and grow stronger.

Can Tsuyoshi survive and thrive in this otherworld, overcoming the trials that await him?

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

title.en: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Pan wo Yaitara Seijo ni Job Change Shimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢ですが、パンを焼いたら聖女にジョブチェンジしました!?

description.en: Even spirits are enthralled by Tia's homemade bread! After being reincarnated into the world of a girls' game and finishing her punishment as the villainous lady, all that's left is to live freely!! Having exited the public eye as planned, Avaritia has taken up bread-making, a hobby of her previous life, and is working hard to spread its deliciousness to the people of the other world, who have only ever known hard, difficult-to-eat bread.

title.en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkouichi no Bishoujo o Kudoiteita Rashii: Baito-saki no Soudan Aite ni Ore no Omoibito no Hanashi o Suru to Kanojo wa Naze ka Tere Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～

altTitles.en: It Seems I Was Hitting on the Most Beautiful Girl in School Without Me Noticing: When I Told My Friend at Work About the Girl I Love She Started to Get Embarrassed for Some Reason

description.en:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.
description.ja:
**俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～
趣味の読書を通じて知り合った**

学校一の塩対応美少女・斎藤玲奈と田中湊。
湊は玲奈とのことをバイト先の先輩である柊玲奈に相談するも、なぜか彼女が真っ赤になる!?
すれ違い勝ち確ラブコメ開幕!

title.en: Saikyou Ansatsusha, Class Ten'i de Isekai e

altTitles.ja: 最強暗殺者、クラス転移で異世界へ

altTitles.en: The Strongest Assassin Gets Transferred to Another World With His Whole Class

altTitles.pt-br: O Assassino Mais Forte é Transferido Para Outro Mundo Com Toda a Sua Classe

description.en:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

description.en: The ruthless criminal “Great,” exiled to space for his countless crimes, is banished to the past alongside the King of the Universe, “Rohollah,” after their encounter in space. Great attempts to right the numerous wrongs he committed in the past to try and rewrite a better future…
description.ru: Преследуемый космосом за неисчисляемые злодеяния безумный преступник Великий после встречи с королём космоса Рохум Рогахой был отправлен в прошлое. Но сможет ли Великий исправить ошибки прошлого и переписать будущее...

description.en: This is a short, delicate BL oneshot that’s quite pretty. It’s about budding affection, a mysterious young man we meet in a greenhouse, and the give-and-take of a relationship.

National Intelligence Service black ops agent 'Suhyeok' is tasked with assassinating 'Nanayama,' the Yakuza leader heading a drug trafficking organization in Korea. To his surprise, the target is a captivating woman named 'Anna,' who appears disconnected from any violence. Sensing something amiss with his mission, Suhyeok embarks on a path of vengeance against both the National Intelligence Service, which has betrayed him, and 'Nanayama,' who massacred his comrades.

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita - Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu
Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess...!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

altTitles.ja: ハーモニー

description.en: Published in the slow-release magazine Le Paradis, Harmony is a side story of 14-sai no Koi, following the age gap relationship between middle school student Nagai Tatsumi and his music teacher, Hinohara Yuka.

title.en: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~

altTitles.ja: 商人スキルで魔王城の攻略を目指す ～異世界転移したので最強アイテムとトーク術で生き抜くことにした～

altTitles.en: Aiming to Conquer the Demon King's Castle with Merchant Skills: Since I Have Been Transported to Another World, I Decided to Survive with the Strongest Items and Talk Techniques

description.en:
One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!? 

Win the hearts of the demi-human girls living in Demon King's Castle and aim to escape from Demon King's Castle! A fantasy romantic comedy that opens up a different world with its natural business spirit, begins!

altTitles.ja: ガラクシアス

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898)

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**

altTitles.ja: ほんのり!どんぱっち

description.en: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!
description.ja: 不思議な生物・首領パッチと暮らすビュティ。二人は河原を散歩したり、友達とカラオケしたり、たまに喧嘩もするけど、ほんのりとした日常を過ごしています。だけど首領パッチの知り合いという破天荒が現れて!?

altTitles.ja: ヒトグイ

description.en: Shimada is a ruthless criminal responsible for indiscriminate mass murder, who later resorts to cannibalism. Nagumo, a police officer, is assigned to escort him, heightening the tension. But what unfolds inside the escort vehicle, packed with criminals, marks the beginning of an unimaginable terror—a new kind of immersive survival horror.

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

altTitles.ja: 外村探偵社の招かれざる客

altTitles.en: The Troublesome Guests of Sotomura Detective Agency

description.en: Matsuda is a private eye who runs his own detective firm, taking on quirky cases centered around the local shopping arcade. He's recently taken on a new roommate (and lover) named Kamiko who is unemployed, ruthlessly horny, and was actually a classmate of his from his past. While the two work together to solve cases, they carry on in what starts as a strictly physical relationship, but which by and by evolves into one that neither wants to lose.

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.ja: 君は冥土様

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

altTitles.ja: バーフウラーズ

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

Ji Chi, the young master of a gang, was betrayed and murdered by his fiancé. He was then transmigrated 30 years in the past into the body of a 19-year-old. Here, the Alpha was saved by a kindhearted and gentle Beta during a time of desperation. However, the person who he thought was an angelic savior, had the exact same face as the murderer who killed him in his previous life...

Merciless, younger, bad boy Alpha X Intelligent, soft boy, older, doctor Beta

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.vi: 'Mình biết diễn biến tiếp theo của câu chuyện này.' Ngay trong khoảnh khắc ấy, thế giới cũ bị diệt vong, và một thế giới khác được mở ra. Cuộc sống của một độc giả tầm thường bỗng chuyển sang chương mới, giữa thế giới của một cuốn tiểu thuyết nọ, một cuốn tiểu thuyết mà chỉ mình anh ta biết được kết cục.
description.zh-hk:
「您收到了主線任務。」 長著角的妖怪，熟悉的人物登場…… 太扯了...這是我所讀過的小說劇情！

altTitles.ja: 記憶が消えていくヤンデレ
マジンガーZ

description.en:
An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It has influence from the anime timeline of events.

altTitles.ja: バじゃなくて、ヴァ

description.en:
Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard

The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!

title.en: You Can’t Kill Me: The Secret Bride of the Black Wolf

altTitles.en: When the Black Wolf Calls Me

description.en:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

altTitles.th: บุปผารุ่มราคะ

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.
description.pt-br: A vida de Na Hae-soo se desfaz quando seu marido a trai. Como se não bastasse estar endividada e ter perdido um filho… Em um golpe devastador, ela o flagra fazendo sexo com uma mulher bem mais jovem do que ela. Quebrada e desanimada, Na Hae-soo sente sua vida desmoronando ao seu redor.  No entanto, um jovem misterioso inesperadamente entra em sua vida, pedindo para ser ensinado sobre o amor adulto. Sua vulnerabilidade e sinceridade começam a despertar emoções em Na Hae-soo, desafiando-a a reconsiderar seu caminho a seguir.

altTitles.ja: セックス・ファンタジー

description.en:
Megalasia is a continent where countries fight for supremacy.
There, the people who reign on the battlefield are not strong warriors or experienced magicians, but beautiful girls who wear "Demon Clothes'' that contain the power of demons - Demon Cloth Princess.
During these war-torn times, there was a young man who loved women and wandered all over the continent in order to spread the word "love'' = "sex'' to the world. 
His name is Seed.
The encounter between Seed, who has the ability to seduce the opposite sex and manipulate them to his will, and a certain Demon Cloth Princess causes further turmoil in Megalasia!

With his temptation powers, corrupt the most powerful princesses! A limit-breaking war fantasy story.
description.id: Benua megaleisia, tanah di mana negara-negara bersaing untuk hegemonia. Di sana bukan prajurit kuat atau penyihir veteran yang memerintah di medan perang, tetapi gadis "Maihime" cantik mengenakan pakaian yang memiliki kekuatan dewa iblis. Di tengah-tengah peperang, ada seorang pria muda yang mencintai wanita dan menjelajahi benua untuk mengirimkan "cinta" / "seks" ke dunia, namanya Sid. pertemuan antara Sid, yang memiliki kemampuan untuk merayu lawan jenis dan memanipulasi mereka sesuka hati, dan Maihime tertentu menyebabkan lebih banyak keributan di megaleisia!
description.ja: 国々が覇権を争う大地、メガレイシア大陸。そこで戦場に君臨するのは屈強な戦士でも、老練な魔術師でもなく、 魔神の力を宿した『魔衣』をまとう美少女――魔衣姫たちであった。そんな戦乱の時代、世界に「愛」＝「性」を伝えるため、 大陸各地を放浪している女好きの青年がいた。彼の名はシード。“異性を誘惑し意のままに操る能力”を持つシードと とある魔衣姫の出会いがメガレイシアにさらなる波乱を巻き起こす！

description.en:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !

description.en: Enya and Tarhan are forever bonded once Enya helps Tarhan's family find peace after a tragic accident. However, their bond is challenged when Tarhan goes from a distrusted outsider to the strong and popular vice chief of Agilea. In a society where a healthy body is considered one's greatest asset, Enya is treated with scorn because of her limp. On top of that, her place as Tarhan's lover is threatened when the princess of an ally tribe offers a marriage alliance in times of impending war. Will Enya and Tarhan's love prevail despite the numerous obstacles in their rocky path?

Having never done anything bad and lived a dilligent life, Shushu is suddenly framed for murder and imprisoned in a prison for women.
In order to survive amongst harsh and vicious criminals.

“W-Will you be my prison wife?”

She becomes the wife of her very pretty but very scary roommate, who is also the prettiest(?) girl in the prison, Minicat.

But something is weird.

Why is she suddenly having the kind of feelings she would have for a man for this beautiful Minicat instead?

“It’s a rule, cabbage. Close your eyes when we kiss and I’ll treat you nicely.”

title.en: Byoujaku na Kimi ga Cafe ni Kite Jinsei o Kaeta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 病弱な君がカフェに来て人生を変えた話

altTitles.ja-ro: Byoujaku na Kimi ga Cafe ni Kite Jinsei wo Kaeta Hanashi

altTitles.en: My Body Has Been Possessed by Someone
Someone Possessed My Body for Ten Years
Someone Possessed My Body For 10 Years

altTitles.ja: 誰かが私に憑依した

description.en: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.
description.pt-br:
“Me ouça. Sou o único com quem você pode contar.”

“....”

“Eu sou o único para você.”

“....”

“Apenas eu.”

Mas que desilusão abominável. Por mais de 10 anos, meu corpo foi possuído por outro alguém. Teria sido bom se “essa pessoa” usasse meu corpo e o devolvesse em boas condições, mas ela ainda se casou estando no meu corpo, ela também estava perseguindo meu marido como uma stalker...?

“Primeiro vamos nos divorciar.”

Eu tentei começar uma nova vida deixando meu marido, que estava me tratando como lixo e a minha família que me tratava como sujeira. Mas...

“Indo embora? Você vai me deixar?” —Meu marido que não acreditava em mim.

“Por que você está ficando do lado dele, Irmã?" —Um irmão mais novo que repentinamente estava com ciúmes.

“Fique nessa casa. Você não pode ir a lugar algum.” —Até mesmo o meu pai que me odiava o tempo todo estava repentinamente obcecado?

O que estava errado com eles para agirem assim tão de repente?

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

description.en: Nowadays the MBTI is a very popular personality test in a bunch of countries like South Korea, this categorizes each person in a certain group corresponding to the way they think, feel and express their emotions. This takes us to a secondary school where the most popular and handsome guy “Jaehyuk”, who is actually totally an introverted with difficulties to understand how popular he is and how others see him, develops a crush on a quiet and strange girl of the same class. The problem arises when Jaehyuk starts causing misunderstandings and awkward situations because of his introverted personality while at the same time his crush doesn’t understand why the most popular guy in school is trying to approach her. What is going to happen between these two? Are they going to be able to go past their personalities to have a normal conversation? Will Jaehyuk be able to confess his feelings?
description.pt-br: Você já se perguntou como é, de verdade, o garoto mais popular da escola? Acontece que ele pode ser tão desajeitado e tímido quanto qualquer um de nós. É o que Jayu Nam, uma garota discreta e reservada, começa a perceber depois de um encontro inesperado com Jahyeok Yeo, um colega de classe que parece ser bom em tudo na vida. Bem, quase tudo. Por trás do carisma de Jahyeok, esconde-se um super-introvertido que preferiria ficar em casa, mas sua aparência cativante sempre o empurra para situações sociais. Juntos, Jayu e Jahyeok começam a aprender um pouco sobre amizade e, quem sabe, algo mais…

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

“As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”

altTitles.ko: 계모인데, 죽음을 피하는 게 너무 쉽다

altTitles.en: As A Stepmother, It Is Too Easy To Avoid Death
It's So Easy to Avoid Death by Being a Stepmother
She's A Stepmother, But It's Too Easy To Avoid Death
Stepmother, It's So Easy to Avoid Death

altTitles.es-la: Seré La Madrastra En Esta Historia, Pero Evitare Mi Muerte Destinada

description.en:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.
